title: MY BOTTLE Glass Water Bottle with Sleeve - Water Bottle Plastic glass- Plastic water bottles - Water bottle reusable
description:
Stay stylish and hydrated with thisMY BOTTLE Glass Water Bottle, designed for everyday use at home, school, office, gym, or while traveling. Made fromhigh-quality, durable glass, it comes with asoft protective sleevethat helps keep your drink fresh and your hands comfortable.

Itsleak-proof lidensures no spills, making it perfect for carrying in bags. Theeco-friendly and reusabledesign is not only good for the planet but also helps you save money on disposable plastic bottles.
